content: this legal case involves two parties jm and km who are disputing the ownership of a property the case was brought to the municipal court sesvete as a first instance the court decided to sell the property and distribute the sale price between the parties according to their coownership shares each party received 12 of the total sale price the plaintiff jm claimed that they had coownership rights over the property while the defendant km disputed this and argued for a lower coownership right a noncontentious court proceeding was initiated to divide the coownership and the plaintiff filed a lawsuit the defendant denied that the property was purchased during the marriage and argued for a lower coownership right the court determined that the parties have joint ownership in a 12 ratio and dissolved the coownership accordingly the defendant also sought reimbursement for litigation costs
